_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

Order.description: A document used to order goods and services.

Order.title: Order. Details
Order.description: A document used to order goods and services.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Order. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Order. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Order. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Order. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Order. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

SalesOrderID.title: Order. Sales_ Order Identifier. Identifier
SalesOrderID.description: An identifier for the Order, assigned by the seller.

CopyIndicator.title: Order. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Order. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Order. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Order. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

OrderTypeCode.title: Order. Order Type Code. Code
OrderTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of Order.

Note.title: Order. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

RequestedInvoiceCurrencyCode.title: Order. Requested Invoice_ Currency Code. Code
RequestedInvoiceCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency requested for amount totals in Invoices related to this Order.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Order. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Order. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for all prices in the Order.

TaxCurrencyCode.title: Order. Tax_ Currency Code. Code
TaxCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency requested for tax amounts in Invoices related to this Order.

CustomerReference.title: Order. Customer_ Reference. Text
CustomerReference.description: A supplementary reference for the Order.

AccountingCostCode.title: Order. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Order as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Order. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The buyer's accounting cost centre, applied to the Order as a whole, expressed as text.

LineCountNumeric.title: Order. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Order Lines in the document.

ValidityPeriod.title: Order. Validity_ Period. Period
ValidityPeriod.description: The period for which the Order is valid.

QuotationDocumentReference.title: Order. Quotation_ Document Reference. Document Reference

OrderDocumentReference.title: Order. Order_ Document Reference. Document Reference

OriginatorDocumentReference.title: Order. Originator_ Document Reference. Document Reference
OriginatorDocumentReference.description: A reference to an originator document associated with this document.

CatalogueReference.title: Order. Catalogue Reference
CatalogueReference.description: A reference to the Catalogue on which this Order is based.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Order. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Contract.title: Order. Contract
Contract.description: A contracts associated with this Order.

ProjectReference.title: Order. Project Reference
ProjectReference.description: A project with which this Order is associated.

Signature.title: Order. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

BuyerCustomerParty.title: Order. Buyer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

SellerSupplierParty.title: Order. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

OriginatorCustomerParty.title: Order. Originator_ Customer Party. Customer Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Order. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

Delivery.title: Order. Delivery
Delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.

DeliveryTerms.title: Order. Delivery Terms
DeliveryTerms.description: A set of delivery terms associated with this document.

PaymentTerms.title: Order. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

TransactionConditions.title: Order. Transaction Conditions
TransactionConditions.description: A specification of purchasing or sales conditions applying to the whole Order.

AllowanceCharge.title: Order. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

TaxExchangeRate.title: Order. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
TaxExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Order. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.

PaymentExchangeRate.title: Order. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.

DestinationCountry.title: Order. Destination_ Country. Country
DestinationCountry.description: The country of destination (for customs purposes).

TaxTotal.title: Order. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.

AnticipatedMonetaryTotal.title: Order. Anticipated_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
AnticipatedMonetaryTotal.description: The total amount for the Order anticipated by the buyer.

OrderLine.title: Order. Order Line
OrderLine.description: A line associated with a line in the Catalogue and specifying a kind of item being ordered.
